title: Passing Probability Indicator
description: Get an estimated probability of passing the M1 test based on your performance in practice tests

title: Targeted Practice Mode
description: Focus only on the questions you previously answered incorrectly to improve weak areas

title: Practice Test Reminders
description: Set custom reminders to ensure you stay on track with your practice tests

title: M1 Licensing Guide
description: Step-by-step guidance on obtaining an M1 license, including requirements, tips, and what to expect

title: MTO Handbook Integration
description: Access the official MTO Handbook directly within the app for quick reference

title: Streak Tracking
description: Track your consistency and maintain study streaks to stay motivated

title: Expanded Language Support
description: Enhance accessibility with support for additional languages: Chinese, Hindi, French, Punjabi, Spanish, Portuguese

title: Reset Test Progress
description: Reset all saved test results and start fresh with a clean slate

title: Community Chat & Threads
description: Connect with other riders, ask questions, and share experiences in a dedicated community space

title: Ride Planning
description: Plan and coordinate rides with fellow motorcyclists based on location, skill level, and availability

title: Online Store
description: Browse and purchase motorcycle gear, safety equipment, and accessories directly from the app
